alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 11:51AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pennington County through 1230 PM MDT... At 1151 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Hisega, or 4 miles west of Rapid City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Southwestern Rapid City around 1210 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bear Country, Reptile Gardens and Hart Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
